name: Rocket Spelunker Demo
description:
Rocket_Spelunker Demo levels

playable demo - KEYBOARD ONLY

A = Rotate Left

D= Rotate Right

SPACE BAR = Thrusters

If you touch anything but the BLUE landing pad you get reset to level 1.

P.S  no UI or menu system yet. MAY CONTAIN BUGS AND ERRORS.

Built following a Udemy C# and unity game construction course. Game features and construction are for demonstration purposes only and may be adjusted/removed/changed without notice.
